actions.text: Amendment SA 1774, under the order of 7/23/2013, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 184.
Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 1773. (consideration: CR S5866-5870, S5892-5893; text: CR S5867) To provide a sunset date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 1773.

amends_amendment.purpose: To establish student loan interest rates, and for other purposes.
